newsitem.title: USA: S&P cuts Gulf State Steel of Alabama ratings.
newsitem.headline: S&P cuts Gulf State Steel of Alabama ratings.

text.p: Standard & Poor's said on Friday it has lowered the corporate credit rating and senior secured debt rating on Gulf States Steel Inc of Alabama to B-minus from single-B.

The downgrade reflects S&P expectation that increasingly competitive industry conditions, stemming from capacity additions in the steel plate and steel sheet markets, will continue to hamper the company's operating performance and result in a further deterioration in financial flexibility.
If financial performance were to weaken further due to the increasingly competitive market enviornment, another downgrade could be warranted.
